courses.advice_detail_en: Chilly conditions. Long sleeves and tights or light layering are recommended. Almost no wind, good for maintaining your pace. Surface is dry with low risk of slipping. Air quality is good with little impact on running. Adjust intensity based on how you feel and check your condition more often than usual.
